Workflow.Name: Admin | Sync Template v3 (Desktop flows)
Workflow.Description: This flow retrieves desktop flow information. This information is retrieved from underlying Dataverse tables and requires the user running the flow to have system administrator privileges in the environment. Turning on this flow is optional, and we recommend that you do so only if you're using desktop flows in your tenant and are interested in getting a tenant-wide overview.

Description.description: This flow retrieves desktop flow information. Turning on this flow is optional, and we recommend that you do so only if you're using desktop flows in your tenant and are interested in getting a tenant-wide overview.
